slug.description: Unique textual identifier of the resource. Must not contain spaces.

name.description: Human readable name of the resource

languages.description: ISO 639-1 codes of languages this resource is in

start_time.description: Start UNIX time of the validity of the document in milliseconds

start_date.description: Start ISO timestamp of the validity of the document

start_month.description: Start Year and month of the validity of the document in 'YYYYMM' format where MM is a 01 based month

start_year.description: Start Year of the validity of the document in 'YYYY' format

end_time.description: End UNIX time of the validity of the document in milliseconds

end_date.description: End ISO timestamp of the validity of the document

end_month.description: End Year and month of the validity of the document in 'YYYYMM' format where MM is a 01 based month

end_year.description: End Year of the validity of the document in 'YYYY' format

url.description: Location of the content of the resource for every language. Usually this is a full path to the resource file on the filesystem. Not used for textual resources anymore. Text content is not in the 'content' field.

propertyNames.description: Every key is a ISO 639-1 code

title.description: Title the resource for every language.

propertyNames.description: Every key is a ISO 639-1 code

caption.description: Title the resource for every language.

propertyNames.description: Every key is a ISO 639-1 code

content.description: Title the resource for every language.

propertyNames.description: Every key is a ISO 639-1 code

type.description: Type of the resource. E.g. 'external-text', 'video'. List is configurable

iiif_url.description: URL of the IIIF document image info.json

creation_time.description: Resource creation UNIX time in milliseconds

last_modification_time.description: Resource modification UNIX time in milliseconds

previous_resource_uuid.description: UUID of the resource that comes before this resources
